mapper.select: select id, test_type, student_type, lecture_type, name, days, "time", life_cycle from base_courses_coursegroup where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into base_courses_coursegroup( created, modified, test_type, student_type, lecture_type, name, days, "time", life_cycle ) values ( now(), now(), #{test_type}, #{student_type}, #{lecture_type}, #{name}, #{days}, #{time}, #{life_cycle} )
mapper.update: update base_courses_coursegroup set modified = now(), test_type = #{test_type}, student_type = #{student_type}, lecture_type = #{lecture_type}, name = #{name}, days = #{days}, "time" = #{time}, life_cycle = #{life_cycle} where id = #{id}
